# crypto-market-data-ts

> Comprehensive cryptocurrency market data service with CoinGecko, DeFiLlama, and Fear & Greed Index. Built-in caching, rate limiting, and Edge Runtime compatibility.

## Overview

crypto-market-data-ts is an open-source project by nirholas. Comprehensive cryptocurrency market data service with CoinGecko, DeFiLlama, and Fear & Greed Index. Built-in caching, rate limiting, and Edge Runtime compatibility.

## Repository

- URL: https://github.com/nirholas/crypto-market-data-ts
- Language: TypeScript
- License: MIT
- Author: nirholas

## Contributing

Contributions are welcome. See CONTRIBUTING.md for guidelines.
